tag_list: blg, ron-blumberg, slsg, solana-legal-solutions-group, solana-beach-law-group, san-diego-law-group, civil-litigation, personal-injury, product-liability, insurance-related-matters, equine-law
overview:
Blumberg Law Group, LLP is a general practice, boutique law firm based in Solana Beach, California, located approximately 25 miles from downtown in Northern San Diego County.

We focus primarily on general business transactions and litigation. We also specialize in civil litigation, personal injury, insurance-related matters and intellectual property evaluation and prosecution. We are comprised of four attorneys, assisted by one valuable “of counsel” attorney, and supported by a sophisticated and experienced legal staff.
